title: Anyone in AZ get a decent ping during game
body: Used to get 53 ping before server move now I get at best 85 witch is no big deal but the spikes to 2400 are no joke.

replies.body:
Yes. Since a month ago. I always get a 90 ms, which is fine for me; but nowadays, I get an infernal lag.
I'm seriously thinking to quit league.
We ain't getting no help.
Same here after the move I was at a stable 70-80 ping, then a month or so ago it jumped to 100, now its at 140 for some reason.
Was wondering if it was just my isp COX that was giving AZ problems untill 1 PM I get 86ish ping after I get spikes over 1k :(
had a similar situation happen to me recently. Only the ping drop happened mid game after a dc ping (500ms lock). This was also late at night but tried after that and it hasn't happened since.

:( no mate, I think it's not just your ISP.
I don't know what's going on tho.
If I find a fix, I'll surely post it here.
